about_the_game:
Icetwine is an immersive ice age builder where every drag-and-drop matters. Combine simple materials to craft advanced tools, machines, and structures that will help you create a thriving village amidst a frozen wilderness.

Combine & Craft 🛠️
Experiment with basic resources like wood, stone, and iron to discover new items. For instance, merging a log of wood with a cluster of rocks might yield a Primitive Axe, kickstarting your journey toward more sophisticated constructions.

Build Your Village ❄️
Design and expand your ice age settlement by constructing shelters, workshops, and farms. Grow food, cultivate vital resources, and even raise prehistoric creatures like dodos and mighty mammoths to support your burgeoning community.

Master Resource Management 🔥
Every decision counts in the harsh ice age. Balance your resource gathering and crafting to ensure your villagers have the tools and sustenance they need to survive the frozen challenges ahead.

Features
🐾 Prehistoric World: Explore an authentic ice age setting filled with iconic creatures and natural wonders.
🛠️ Innovative Crafting: Use an intuitive drag-and-drop mechanic to merge materials and unlock new recipes.
🏡 Village Evolution: Build and upgrade structures to accommodate a growing population and evolving needs.
🌾 Farming & Taming: Cultivate food and domesticate dodos and mamoths to bolster your village’s resources.
🧩 Creative Challenges: Solve puzzles by experimenting with various material combinations to uncover hidden blueprints.

name: Icetwine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Icetwine is an ice-age city builder where you drag and combine raw materials to craft tools, machines, and structures! Unite wood, stone, and iron to build cozy huts, thriving farms, and even tame dodos and mammoths as you forge a flourishing prehistoric village!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Italian
